lib/hope/serialization/custom_serializer_holder.h

00008 
00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/typelist/type_list.h"
00012 
00013 namespace hope::serialization {
00014 
00015     class package;
00016 
00017     namespace detail {
00018 
00019         struct entity_tag {};
00020 
00021     }
00022 
00023     template<typename Tag, typename Serializer, typename Deserializer>
00024     struct entity final : detail::entity_tag{
00025         using tag_t = Tag;
00026         using serializer_t = Serializer;
00027         using deserializer_t = Deserializer;
00028     };
00029 
00030     template<typename... Serializer>
00031     class custom_serializer_holder final {
00032 
00033         constexpr void type_check() {
00034             hope::for_each(type_list<Serializer...>{}, [](auto type_holder) {
00035                 using clear_t = typename std::decay_t<decltype(type_holder)>::Type;
00036                 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<detail::entity_tag, clear_t>);
00037             });
00038         }
00039 
00040     public:
00041         template<typename Tag>
00042         constexpr static bool has() {
00043             bool has_type{ false };
00044             hope::for_each(type_list<Serializer...>{}, [&](auto type_holder) {
00045                 using clear_t = typename std::decay_t<decltype(type_holder)>::Type;
00046                 has_type |= std::is_same_v<typename clear_t::tag_t, Tag>;
00047             });
00048             return has_type;
00049         }
00050 
00051         template<typename Tag>
00052         constexpr static auto serializer() {
00053             constexpr auto index = index_of<Tag>();
00054             using entity_t = NthType<index, Serializer...>;
00055             return type_holder<typename entity_t::serializer_t>();
00056         }
00057 
00058         template<typename Tag>
00059         constexpr static auto deserializer() {
00060             constexpr auto index = index_of<Tag>();
00061             using entity_t = NthType<index, Serializer...>;
00062             return type_holder<typename entity_t::deserializer_t>();
00063         }
00064 
00065     private:
00066         template <typename Tag>
00067         constexpr static std::size_t index_of() {
00068             return find_if(type_list<Serializer...>{ }, [](auto type_holder) {
00069                 using clear_t = typename std::decay_t<decltype(type_holder)>::Type;
00070                 return std::is_same_v<Tag, typename clear_t::tag_t>;
00071             });
00072         }
00073     };
00074 
00075 }
